title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the properties view, the label does not disappear in the new PDF emitter.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the properties view and previewed in PDF, the label should disappear.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the properties view.
3. Set the display property to 'none' in the sectionDisplay field.
4. Preview the PDF.
